Our Services

The glamping industry is relatively new and as with any emerging industry many questions arise as to where to start and how to optimize your business. At Global Glamping we have taken the guess work out of the process! By developing our own proof of concept at the Global Glamping Headquarters in Montana we harnessed the power of best practices both for the new entrepreneur and the expanding camp owner. Our straightforward process:

We review your vision and idea for your glampcamp and evaluate how it would work in the marketplace. If necessary we will conduct a market validation study to make sure the dream fits well with market demand.

An experienced project manager will begin putting your glamp plan together including: 3D model rendering of the property Financial statements to reflect potential Return on Investment Necessary local permitting and guideline considerations Marketing and promotion plan Complete list of all amenities, adventures/excursions, and necessary additional structures Interior design plans

Order all necessary items and complete paperwork for local permits. One last risk assessment prior to construction.

Installation and setup of your camp along with pictures, drone footage, and staging for social media and online booking platforms. We go over all of the specifics for running your glamping business with you so you are an informed owner from day one!
